Group A.question: What is polymorphism?
Group A.answer: Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms.

Group A.question: Show an example of polymorphism in Python.

Group C.question: What is abstraction?
Group C.answer: Abstraction is the concept of hiding the complex reality while exposing only the necessary parts.

Group C.question: Give an example of an abstract class.
